nodes.text: Darth Vader: The Man, The Warrior, The Commander

Darth Vader: The Man, The Warrior, The Commander is an illustrated reference book written by Benjamin Harper that tells the story of Anakin Skywalker from the Star Wars saga, recapping moments from Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace through Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. The book was originally included with the Star Wars: Build Darth Vader kit and both were published by becker&mayer! on September 1, 2014. The book was later republished by Quarto Knows with the Star Wars Master Models: Darth Vader kit on October 10, 2017.
